Package uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.hbase

Package responsible for interfacing with HBase for the purpose of data storage.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HBaseAutoWriter
    Facilitates automatic transfer between any AutoWritable instance and HBase provided that:
    1) the unqualified class name of the AutoWritable is the same as the name of a table in HBase
    2) for every field in the AutoWritable descendant type there is a corresponding HBase column with name "f1:[col name]"
    HBaseConnection  
    HBaseConstants
    A location for constant values internal to HBase to be specified.
    Statistic
    A class to represent a row in the HBase Statistic table, characterising the traffic through a router in a timeframe.
    Threat
    A Class used to represent a single row in the HBase Threat table.
    The threat was processed at timeProcessed (in UNIX time) in the logged data for the router identified by routerId.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    HBaseKey
    Annotation used to identify the parts of an HBaseAutoWriter which represent parts of the key.

Package uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.hbase Description
